overview:
Marwan Soghaier is a product visionary who has worked in leadership positions for over a decade with many highly successful brands and now serves as VP of product Developement for SteelHouse, a digital display advertising platform for eCommerce marketers.

Marwan has had an extensive history developing marketing technology and creating effective, accessible product interfaces and platforms. Before his current position, he served as VP Marketing at mobileStorm, Inc. and as VP Product Marketing at the Rubicon Project, where he designed a user interface for the premier online ad network.
